ygData.subject: Re: Hmm....
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, then how do we add the abbrevation to our name? Sorry LKW. But I think I am very VERY very confused now. And how do we do the /g thing if we are splited up
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, then how do we add the abbrevation to our name? Sorry LKW. But I think I
am very VERY very confused now. And how do we do the /g thing if we are
splited up everyday? Please elaborate...cos' I am going bonkers. Pai seh.

Wilson aka Yutaka

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> Aiya, it's still an 'official' guild in EQ eye, ie with guild abbrev in
our
> name, but 'unofficial' in the sense that we dun run it like an official
> guild. In official guild we need to consider many things like guild
> structure, treasury, rankings, titles, activities, small team leadership
> etc. This EQ guild just work like a group of friends lor ;)
